name: "BOUND" IT'S A LUNKEN
description:
Previously only available from Twilight Luggage, this is a CDR version of the second album "BOUND".

53 minutes of music, track listing:

1.BOUND IN THE BLACK BARK PT.1
2.MK30 BOUND BY THE BLOODY BORDER BUILT
3.BOUND IN THE BLACK BARK PT.2
4.MK18
5.MK32 BOUND AND DROWNED

name: C60 Tape Split - IT'S A LUNKEN / Andreas Brandal
description: Experimental sounds from the cold woods of Norway once again find their way across the North Sea; as Andreas Brandal joins forces with IT'S A LUNKEN in an acousmatic collaboration. Strictly limited edition of thirty C60 cassettes. Handmade artwork includes written work by B.Yianni, digital and woodcut prints. Track listing: ANDREAS BRANDAL 1. TRAFALMADORE PART 1 - 15.05 1. TRAFALMADORE PART 2 - 14.29 IT'S A LUNKEN 1. Mk23 - 4.40 2. WEAVEWORLD#1 - 5.86 3. BEFORE BOUND - 5.87 4. CHIMEBOX (live) - 2.87 5. WEAVEWORLD#2 - ~10.00 £3+P&P Sound samples available at::::::: myspace.com/itisalunken myspace.com/thedeadstation andreasbrandal.com Here is a 2 minute exert from the recording:::::: vimeo.com/5422617

name: C90 Tape Split - DSIC "FITS AND SPASMS" / IT'S A LUNKEN "MK29 MK25 MK15"
description: AFTER PURCHASING THE TAPE YOU WILL BE EMAILED A LINK AND PASSWORD TO ACCESS A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD VERSION OF THE TAPE. Track listing: DSIC 1. FITS AND SPASMS IT'S A LUNKEN 1. Mk29 2. Mk25 3. Mk15 STEREO CASSETTE: 90 MINUTES OF CAUSTIC NOISE, CRUSHING GUITAR AND ILLBIENT SOUNDSCAPES INCLUDES::::::::::: WRAPPING MADE FROM 1 OF 4 LUMINESCENT POSTERS AND 1 OF 2 MINIATURE FABRIC TRANSFERS LIMITED EDITION OF 50 £4+P&P A 4 minute 50 second section is available to listen at::::::: myspace.com/itisalunken

name: C120 Tape Album - "BOUND" IT'S A LUNKEN
description: To celebrate the release of our second album "BOUND" through Twilight Luggage Records, here is a limited edition of 6 hand painted and bound cassettes. Track listing is the same both sides and runs for ~60 minutes. IT'S A LUNKEN - BOUND 1. BOUND BY THE BLACK BARK PART 1 2. MK30/BOUND BY THE BLOODY BORDER BUILT 3. BOUND BY THE BLACK BARK PART 2 4. MK18 5. HOARD 6. MK32/BOUND AND DROWNED How it happened: A track bearing the moniker [signature; nickname] BOUND instead of MK gets into the pool somehow; a second BOUND is written in answer [reaction; rejoinder; antiphony]. It doesn’t require a leap [soar; jolt] to see why an idea emerges to do a record. Leap [dive; bound] at the chance with Twilight Luggage. Where the BOUND comes from: It seems to be low [depression; nadir] frequency dissonance; additional bass weight for kicks [buzz; thrill]; noise is slower down there. For heightened [delicate] focus [concentrate]. Feint [stratagem; manoeuvre] of noise; revealing noise [resonance; silence]. A series of documenting [essays; evidences]; [icons; depictions; snapshots] of developmental stages in the music making. Ideas completed thoroughly [painstakingly] and through to conclusion. The research leads us back to a MK: it can be said that the final track on the record is the informed result of what went before it [a priori]. Descriptively: BOUND is the sound of experiments exploring the noise side of IT'S A LUNKEN and how to get back from it, with an evaluation of findings in the guise of an apocalyptic sludged-out dirge. £6.66 +P&P to your area. The album is available to download for free or to order on CD-R from www.twilightluggage.com
